mapper.select: select `title` title, `sub_title` subTitle, `function_type` functionType, `function_code` functionCode, `params` as paramsStr, `detail_url` detailUrl,date_format(`publish_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') publishTime, `small_pic` smallPic from wj_activity_info where `is_valid`=0 order by publish_time desc LIMIT #{page},10
select product_id as productId from wj_product_finace where product_flag='greenhorn' and remain_balance>=100 and is_shelves='yes' and is_sold_out='no' order by create_date desc limit 1

select `title` title, `sub_title` subTitle, `function_type` functionType, `function_code` functionCode, `params` as paramsStr, `detail_url` detailUrl,date_format(`publish_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') publishTime, `small_pic` smallPic, weixin_link_url as weixinLinkUrl, weixin_pic_url as weixinPicUrl from wj_activity_info where `is_valid` = 0 and version = #{version} order by sort LIMIT 0,3
